'''Clark Kabir''' is the doctor who diagnosed Ben's tumor.

==History==
When Bailey found a lump in Ben's testicle while they were having sex, she took him immediately to the hospital to get examined. Clark did an ultrasound and asked Ben some questions about his ejaculation. Clark took several images of the mass and said, combined with his labs, it appeared to be cancerous, so he proposed orchiectomy to remove the mass, along with the rest of his testicle, and analyze the tissue. Ben and Bailey were shocked that his plan was so radical, but he impressed upon them the importance of acting quickly, before any cancerous cells could spread throughout his body. ''("[[I Guess I'm Floating]]")''

Clark later removed the testicle successfully. ''("[[Comfortably Numb]]")''

==Career==
He is a [[Urology|urologist]] working at his own private practice named Kabir Urology Clinic. He performs his surgeries at [[East Bay Surgical Center]], meaning he either splits his time between his clinic and the hospital or just holds surgical privileges at the latter.
